courses.name: React.js - The Complete Guide
courses.description: Master modern React from beginner to advanced! Next.js, Context API, React Query, Redux, Tailwind, advanced patterns
courses.author: Robert Hederson
contents: Become an advanced, confident, and modern React developer from scratch
Become job-ready by working with libraries and tools used in professional projects
Join my other 1,900,000+ happy students on this journey
Build 10+ beautiful projects, including two HUGE professional real-world apps
Build single-page applications with React Router (including v6.4+ with data loading)

courses.name: Learn Vue.js with expert developer
courses.description: Vue.js is an awesome JavaScript Framework for building Frontend Applications! VueJS mixes the Best of Angular + React!
courses.author: AI Sweigart
contents: Build amazing Vue.js Applications - all the Way from Small and Simple Ones up to Large Enterprise-level Ones
Leverage Vue.js in both Multi- and Single-Page-Applications (MPAs and SPAs)
Understand the Theory behind Vue.js and use it in Real Projects
Learn the latest version of Vue (Vue 3), including the brand-new Composition API

courses.name: The Complete Angular course: Beginner to Pro
courses.description: Develop comprehensive and reactive Angular applications including NgRx, Unit Testing, Signals, and Angular Material.
courses.author: Jose Portilla
contents: Learn modern Angular, including standalone components & signals from the ground up & in great detail!
Develop modern, complex, responsive and scalable web applications with Angular
Learn TypeScript, a modern JavaScript superset, along the way
Learn how to send HTTP requests, implement routing, authenticate users or handle complex forms - and much more!

courses.name: Complete React, Next.js & TypeScript
courses.description: Develop React JS web applications including components, state, effect, hooks, React router, reducer, context, etc.
courses.author: Dr.Angela Yu
contents: Become an advanced, confident, and modern React developer from scratch
Become job-ready by working with libraries and tools used in professional projects
Join my other 1,900,000+ happy students on this journey
Build 10+ beautiful projects, including two HUGE professional real-world apps
Build single-page applications with React Router (including v6.4+ with data loading)

courses.name: Vue 3 in Action: Master the Framework
courses.description: Master Vue 3: TypeScript, Composition API only, Vue Router, Pinia, Best Practices!
courses.author: Dev Nirwal
contents: Build amazing Vue.js Applications - all the Way from Small and Simple Ones up to Large Enterprise-level Ones
Leverage Vue.js in both Multi- and Single-Page-Applications (MPAs and SPAs)
Understand the Theory behind Vue.js and use it in Real Projects
Learn the latest version of Vue (Vue 3), including the brand-new Composition API

courses.name: Angular- The MEAN Stack Guide
courses.description: Master Angular2 and build awesome, reactive web apps with the successor of Angular.js
courses.author: Ritu Antil
contents: Learn modern Angular, including standalone components & signals from the ground up & in great detail!
Develop modern, complex, responsive and scalable web applications with Angular
Learn TypeScript, a modern JavaScript superset, along the way
Learn how to send HTTP requests, implement routing, authenticate users or handle complex forms - and much more!

courses.name: Typescript: The Complete course
courses.description: Get started with TypeScript and learn how to build robust applications with type safety.
courses.author: Mikio Hara
contents: Understand the basics of TypeScript, including types, interfaces, and classes.
Learn how to integrate TypeScript into your existing JavaScript projects.
Discover how to use TypeScript for frontend frameworks like React and Angular.
Explore advanced TypeScript features like generics and decorators.

courses.name: JavaScript - The Definitive Guide
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to modern JavaScript, covering ES6 features and best practices.
courses.author: David Flanagan
contents: Understand JavaScript fundamentals, including variables, functions, and scope.
Explore ES6 features like arrow functions, promises, and modules.
Learn to manipulate the DOM and handle events for interactive web applications.
Implement asynchronous programming with callbacks, promises, and async/await.

courses.name: Node.js - The Complete Guide
courses.description: Master Node.js and build scalable server-side applications.
courses.author: Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller
contents: Understand the core concepts of Node.js, including event-driven architecture.
Learn to build RESTful APIs using Express.js.
Implement authentication and authorization in your applications.
Deploy Node.js applications to production.

courses.name: Python for Backend Development
courses.description: Learn how to use Python for backend development with Flask and Django.
courses.author: Jane Doe
contents: Build web applications with Flask.
Understand the principles of RESTful APIs.
Learn to work with databases using SQLAlchemy.
Implement user authentication and security.

courses.name: Java Spring Boot for Beginners
courses.description: Create Java web applications using Spring Boot framework.
courses.author: John Smith
contents: Learn the basics of Spring Boot framework.
Create RESTful services with Spring MVC.
Connect to databases using Spring Data JPA.
Deploy Spring Boot applications.

courses.name: Ruby on Rails - The Complete Course
courses.description: Develop robust web applications using Ruby on Rails.
courses.author: Emily Johnson
contents: Understand the MVC architecture in Rails.
Build a complete web application from scratch.
Learn to use Rails gems for rapid development.
Deploy your application to Heroku.

courses.name: Django for Backend Development
courses.description: Build powerful web applications with Django framework.
courses.author: Michael Brown
contents: Learn the fundamentals of Django.
Build a fully functional blog application.
Implement user authentication and permissions.
Create REST APIs using Django Rest Framework.

courses.name: Modern PHP: The Complete Guide - from Beginner to Advanced
courses.description: Learn PHP from scratch and build dynamic websites.
courses.author: Sarah Connor
contents: Understand the basics of PHP programming.
Learn to work with MySQL databases.
Build dynamic websites with PHP and HTML.
Implement form handling and validation.

courses.name: Go - The Complete Developer's Guide
courses.description: Master Go programming language and build scalable applications.
courses.author: Alex Turner
contents: Learn the fundamentals of Go programming.
Build concurrent applications with Goroutines.
Understand Go's standard library.
Deploy Go applications to cloud services.

courses.name: ASP.NET Core for Beginners
courses.description: Build web applications using ASP.NET Core.
courses.author: Laura Wilson
contents: Understand the basics of ASP.NET Core.
Create a web application using MVC pattern.
Implement RESTful APIs with ASP.NET.
Deploy your application on Azure.
